column5: I'm at a loss for words, sorry  for your loss, u and your family are in my prayers. I can't imagine what your going through. I'm am so sorry

I'm sorry for your loss, burying your son or daughter is the hardest thing in the world to go through and that's y I haven't gone through with it cause I don't want my mother to have to do it plus I have a 13 year old daughter to take care of cause her mom is a p.o.s
I was also always the one who like to cuddle, or say I love u, or wanted constant affection. But now I think no one else wants the same anymore
I know what u mean, I'm tired of hearing that it will get better cause for years now it hasn't. I think I hit rock bottom but then it gets lower
Buffalo area, little far to commute lol
What area do u live in

I've been raising my daughter on my own for over 12 years and focused on her while she was growing up, now she has friends and a life I feel alone and have no one for adult interaction at home I just turned 41
I'm not ugly but not a model either most women thats all that they seem to want. I'm very loving and caring loyal person. I've tried dating sites but nothing ever worked out. So I know what u mean exactly
Doesn't help that I might b bisexual either. People say I should get a script from my dr for depression but I dont want to feel fake
No it doesn't its been this way for years I change but the results r the same
